cv.title: BACKEND ENGINEER
cv.summary: With almost one year of experience in backend development and solid frontend skills, I have worked on creating and optimizing APIs and microservices, improving architecture and efficiency across multiple business projects. I hold a degree in Computer Engineering with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Computing. In my free time, I continue learning through books, videos, and online courses. I bring a combination of technical and analytical knowledge to effectively solve complex problems.
cv.date-range: January 2024 - October 2024 ¬∑ 9 months [Mallorca, Spain] [Hospitality Industry, B2B]
responsibilities: Developed and implemented the backend of a web application for managing reservation center data at Grupo Pi√±ero using Java and the Spring Boot framework.
Designed and integrated APIs through MuleSoft...
Managed tools and applications related to Oracle ERP.
Version control using Git and branch management with Git Flow.
achievements: Optimized backend functions across 5+ different projects.
Improved architecture by integrating MyBatis module and reusable base structure.
cv.specialization: Specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Computing.
